channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Musk vows to start a new political party. Here's why that's harder than it sounds.
item.description: Billionaire Elon Musk is floating a new political party dubbed the "America Party" — but the idea could face major hurdles.

item.title: US expands militarized zones to 1/3 of southern border, stirring controversy

item.description: Republicans see a lot to celebrate, but Democrats are hoping to build momentum leading into the 2026 midterms.

item.title: Trump to sign "big, beautiful bill" in July Fourth ceremony at White House
item.description: President Trump is hosting a celebratory event at the White House to sign his "one big, beautiful bill."

item.title: Notorious Swedish crime boss arrested 1,600 miles away
item.description: Ismael Abdo is one of Sweden's most wanted criminals and the subject of an international arrest warrant since 2024.

item.title: WATCH: Remembering the Real ‘Uncle Sam’ on Independence Day
item.description: Uncle Sam, long a symbol of the U.S. government, was inspired by a real person — Sam Wilson, a meatpacker from Troy, New York, born in 1766.
